title: Elementary Mathematics Teacher Coaching Program Based on Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics subject-matter knowledge and foundational classroom management experience
context.additional_context: A one-on-one coaching program conducted in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments. Operates with task submissions simulating real classroom situations and feedback-centered management.

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately utilize ≥5 types of open-ended questions that elicit students’ thinking processes.
Learners can observe students’ responses during class and apply ≥3 instructional strategies to immediately support meaning-making.
Learners can analyze their teaching videos based on coaching feedback to derive ≥2 improvement points.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
